raw_body: SEMAGE - BASIRI SARANACHANDRA (08.02.1944 - 15.04.2024). Dearly loved husband of Sunila, loving father of Lakmalee and Yohan, father-in-law of Beryl and Niroosha, loving Seeya of Aaron, Joshua, Joel and Adalia, brother of Cecilia, Bianca (late), Swarnathilaka, Nanda (late), Quintas, Arunakanthi (late) and Thissa.
